title: PBE and Alpha client
body: I've been waiting so long to see if i have made it I check my email every day. Please accept me rito ;-;.

replies.body: We can't expedite applications to testing realms, I'm afraid.  You can check our [FAQ ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pbe-faq)for some insight on how testers are chosen, but generally just make sure that you're account is in good standing.  Best of luck with admissions!
